cd64b768-2c9a-4d31-b6a2-af2d0d81b73f.description: Certified Tax Coaches have satisfactorily completed AICTP Tax Planning Academy. This rigorous training prepares coaches to use our resources to complete a proactive tax plan. Must be a licensed professional CPA, EA or Tax Attorney.
cd64b768-2c9a-4d31-b6a2-af2d0d81b73f.name: Certified Tax Coach

issuer.summary: issued by The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners

entity.name: The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners

badge_template_activities.title: Candidate must be a CPA, EA, attorney or financial service provider, with advanced training in proactive tax planning from The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners.

44dbf3db-3381-4a3b-b798-9c54ddf93aef.description: Certified Tax Planners are uniquely qualified to help businesses and their owners keep more of what they earn through Advanced Tax Reduction. In short, a Certified Tax Planner is capable of identifying potential tax breaks, credits, loopholes, and deductions and providing the legally required support for compliance within the tax law. CTP’s have received advanced training in tax planning for business owners and must meet minimum continuing education requirements.
44dbf3db-3381-4a3b-b798-9c54ddf93aef.name: Certified Tax Planner

issuer.summary: issued by The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners

entity.name: The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners

badge_template_activities.title: Complete at least 10 tax planning cases for businesses and their owners and have satisfactory online reviews without complaints. All Certified Tax Planners are accepted by the American Institute of Certified Tax Planners advisory board and must possess a minimum of 1 year of experience as a Certified Tax Coach, a minimum of 12 hours annually of tax planning courses.
All CTPs must abide by the AICTP Code of Professional Conduct and Ethics.

22e87941-4ebc-4a28-bf34-66e2ed93fb67.description: Completed 3 years in the American Institute of Certified Tax Planner program, and completed 30 tax plans. CTS’s are uniquely qualified to help businesses and their owners keep more of what they earn through Advanced Tax Reduction have received advanced training in tax planning for business owners and must meet minimum continuing education requirements.
22e87941-4ebc-4a28-bf34-66e2ed93fb67.name: Certified Tax Strategist

issuer.summary: issued by The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners

entity.name: The American Institute of Certified Tax Planners

badge_template_activities.title: Candidate must be an active member of the Institute for at least three consecutive years and have developed a minimum of 30 tax plans in that time frame.
